resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "group": {
                "type": "keyword"
            },
            "user": {
                "type": "nested",
                "properties": {
                    "first": {
                        "type": "keyword"
                    },
                    "last": {
                        "type": "keyword"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "group": "fans",
        "user": [
            {
                "first": "John",
                "last": "Smith"
            },
            {
                "first": "Alice",
                "last": "White"
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    fields=[
        "*"
    ],
    source=False,
)
print(resp2)
